flawed_nl_solution:
There are 50 / 2 = <<50/2=25>>25 people in economy class.
There are 25 people in business first and business class, so there are 25 - 3 = <<25-3=17>>17 in business class.
Thus, there are 30 - 17 = <<30-17=13>>13 unoccupied seats in business class.
#### 13

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 22, not 17. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
